String

Allows a listener to add a new participant.

- ozpIwc.Router/#registerParticipant:event

    the participant object that contains a send() function.

    The handshake requesting registration.

Returns:

String:

returns participant id

send

(
  • packet
  • sendingParticipant
)

Defined in app/js/bus/transport/router.js:442

Used by participant listeners to route a message to other participants.

Fires: -ozpIwc.Router/#preSend:event -ozpIwc.Router/#send:event

Parameters:

  • packet ozpIwc.TransportPacket

    The packet to route.

  • sendingParticipant ozpIwc.Participant

    Information about the participant that is attempting to send the packet.
